job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: Terminus is the only accountbased engagement platform built to deliver more pipeline and revenue through multichannel accountbased marketing ABM The platform Terminus Engagement Hub connects the first and thirdparty data needed to understand both customers and prospects with the most robust suite of engagement channelsincluding ads chat email and webavailable Terminus powers multichannel ABM for thousands of brands globally including DHL G2 Outreach and TripActions Terminus is proud to be a G2 leader in ABM for 13 consecutive quarters Visit terminuscom to learn more or connect with us on Twitter and LinkedIn brbrTerminus is seeking an accomplished strongSoftware Engineerstrong to help us build an industry leading AccountBased Marketing platform that allows B2B marketers to do ABM at scale This role will be pivotal in helping our teams build scale and deliver bestinclass ABM platform on the market to our customers This will include working with thirdparty data and integrations ETL jobs our data platform as well as a variety of our other services which require experience in but not limited to APIs messaging and automationbrbrMost importantly we are looking for engineers that exemplify our core values positive supportive and selfstarting Like us we want you to be excited every day about working with this team and building great software We are passionate about delivering highquality code and providing our customers with features that they need and lovebrbrAs a fast growing startup Terminus offers an incredible opportunity for a senior software engineer to learn grow personally and professionally and be part of building our company and culturebrbrstronguResponsibilitiesbrustrongulliWrite and review services coded in Go primarily Python Typescript Ruby Java and other languagesframeworks as necessaryliliDesign and implement large scale data solutionsliliDeploy highvolume services to production multiple times per dayliliMaintain infrastructureascode in an AWS environment We use TerraformliliInstrument code to provide visibility into performance and reliabilityliliDocument service designarchitecture and participate in design reviewsliliMaintain operations by measuring and monitoring availability latency and overall system healthliliWork with Support to triage and debug customer and product issuesbrliulstronguRequirementsbrustrongulli2 years of professional software experience in one or more of the following Go C C Java C or Rubylili2 years experience running production systems on a major cloud providerliliExperience in building maintaining and monitoring distributed services and systemsliliExperience with RPCRESTful API designliliExperience in multiple database designs relational document graphliliExperience with Microservices architecturebrliulstronguPreferred Experience With The FollowingbrustrongulliAWSliliDesigning and developing public APIsliliDocker in a production environmentliliExperience with big data technology eg Spark Hive etcbrliulstrongIncredible Benefits Incredible CompanybrstrongulliGuaranteed participation in our equity program  because our employees should share in our successliliUnlimited vacation to unplug and recharge however you chooseliliHalfDay Fridays to reward you for your productivitylili2 days paid VTO volunteer time off every year to help impact your communityliliMonthly UberEats stipend to help support your favorite local spotsliliTeam budget to help facilitate team building  connected teams are more successful teamsliliRotating quarterly perks for the evolving needs of our employeesliliWellness stipend to balance your body and mindlili100 employer paid Health Dental and Vision Insurance for employee only coverage to cover your fundamental needslili100 employer paid Shortterm and Longterm Disability Insurancelili401K with a competitive company match to build your future financial securityliliWe put families first with an exceptional Paid Parental Leave Program for employees with 1 years of serviceliliNamed Best Workplace Winner 2017 2018 and 2019 by Inc Magazine liliRanked 21 on the Deloitte Fast 500liliRanked 61 on the Inc 5000 of fastestgrowing private companies in the USliliNamed G2 2020 Spring category leader for the 10th consecutive quarterbrliulDiversity and inclusion are essential
